//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "a2_sarge" );
	use ( "a2_soldier_one" );
	use ( "a2_soldier_two" );
	use ( "alarm2" );

	affect ( "a2_sarge", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "HoldArea" );
		set ( "SET_AREAGOAL", "alarm_two_spot" );
	}

}
